law.catch_line: An applicant for a billiard table license shall pay to the clerk a license fee of:...
law.text:
An applicant for a billiard table license shall pay to the clerk a license fee of:
$10 for each billiard table in a county other than Baltimore City, Baltimore County, or Cecil County;
$20 for each billiard table in Cecil County; or
$40 for each billiard table in Baltimore City.
